"遠く過ぎ去りし跡の欠片":
"Dear <%me>,
I hear you've begun exploring the ruins!
Matoi becomes restless whenever she
thinks of that place. I'm at a loss of what
to do next... Something at the ruins has
to be tied to Matoi's lost memory. I'm so
sorry to keep asking but could you bring
back some debris from the ruins?
※Objetivo Nv.47+ Darkers.
Ruins área only."
